mapper.sql: working_procedure_id AS " workingProcedureId", user_id AS "userId", production_station_id AS "productionStationId", accessories AS "accessories", remark AS "remark", working_procedure_name AS "workingProcedureName", working_procedure_class AS "workingProcedureClass", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from working_procedure where 1 = 1
and working_procedure_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.workingProcedureId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and production_station_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.productionStationId},'%')
and accessories like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.accessories},'%')
and remark like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.remark},'%')
and working_procedure_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.workingProcedureName},'%')
and working_procedure_class like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.workingProcedureClass},'%')
